trans-unit.source: Defines common functionality for controls that are hosted within cells of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Definerer felles funksjonalitet for kolonner som er vert i cellene i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented by controls, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl>, that are hosted by corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> cells, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>, when they are in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Dette grensesnittet implementeres av kontroller, slik som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl>, som er vert svarer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>cellene, for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>, når de er i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl>

trans-unit.source: Cell types that can host editing controls set their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType%2A> property to a <xref:System.Type> representing the editing control type.
trans-unit.target: Celle typene som er vert for redigering Kontroller Sett deres <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType%2A>egenskapen til en <xref:System.Type>som representerer redigering kontrollere type.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the cell enters edit mode, the following steps are performed: 1.
trans-unit.target: Når cellen går inn i redigeringsmodus, utføres følgende trinn: 1.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control creates an instance of the editing control type.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen oppretter en forekomst av redigering kontrolltypen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control calls the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InitializeEditingControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen kaller cellen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InitializeEditingControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InitializeEditingControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You can override this method to transfer the cell value to the editing control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre denne metoden for å overføre celleverdien til redigering kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control calls the editing control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl.ApplyCellStyleToEditingControl%2A> method and passes in the cell's current style.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen kaller redigering kontrollen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl.ApplyCellStyleToEditingControl%2A>metoden og formidler i den cellen gjeldende stil.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl.ApplyCellStyleToEditingControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You can implement this method to initialize the appearance of the editing control so that it matches the appearance of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Du kan implementere denne metoden for å starte utseendet til redigering kontroll slik at den samsvarer med utseendet til cellen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control calls the editing control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl.PrepareEditingControlForEdit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen kaller redigering kontrollen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl.PrepareEditingControlForEdit%2A>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl.PrepareEditingControlForEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You can implement this method to make final adjustments to the editing control, such as selecting the control value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan implementere denne metoden for å endre endelig redigering kontrollen, for eksempel velge kontrollverdi.

trans-unit.source: For more information about implementing IDataGridViewEditingControl, see [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om implementering av IDataGridViewEditingControl [slik: vert styrer i Windows Forms DataGridView celler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Cell types such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> that provide a user interface (UI) for specifying values without hosting an editing control implement the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell> interface.
trans-unit.target: Celle typer som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>som gir en brukergrensesnittet (UI) for å angi verdier uten å være vert for en redigering kontrollen Implementer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: The UI in this case is displayed regardless of whether the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Brukergrensesnittet vises i dette tilfellet uansett om cellen er i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: Other cell types, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>, provide a UI but do not store user-specified values.
trans-unit.target: Annen celle datatyper, for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>, gir et brukergrensesnitt, men ikke lagre brukerangitte verdier.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the cell type does not implement <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell> or host an editing control.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet celle-typen implementerer ikke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell>eller er vert for en kontroll for redigering.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell>

trans-unit.source: Changes the control's user interface (UI) to be consistent with the specified cell style.
trans-unit.target: Endrer kontrollens brukergrensesnittet (UI) ikke samsvarer med den angitte cellen-stilen.

trans-unit.source: Typically, an implementation of this method will set UI properties for the editing control, such as font, background color, and foreground color, to the values of corresponding properties in the `dataGridViewCellStyle`, which is the style used for the cell hosting the control.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis implementering av denne metoden vil WantDestinationQueue Brukergrensesnittet egenskaper for redigering kontrollen, for eksempel skrift, bakgrunnsfarge og forgrunnen for verdiene i tilhørende egenskaper i den `dataGridViewCellStyle`, som er stilen for celle som er vert for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to use as the model for the UI.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som brukes som modellen for Brukergrensesnittet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> som inneholder cellen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being edited; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> som inneholder den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> som redigeres; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis det er ikke tilknyttet <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the formatted value of the cell being modified by the editor.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den formaterte verdien i cellen som endres av redigeringsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: The formatted value represents the value as it is displayed in the control's user interface.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er formatert representerer verdien som de vises i brukergrensesnittet for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The formatted value may be different in absolute value and even data type from the actual value contained in the control.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er formatert kan være forskjellig i absoluttverdien og selv datatype fra den faktiske verdien i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the formatted value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer den formaterte verdien i cellen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the hosting cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir indeksen for verts cellen overordnet rad.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl> interface does not define a corresponding `ColumnIndex` property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl>grensesnittet definerer ikke en tilsvarende `ColumnIndex` egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl.EditingControlDataGridView%2A> property to retrieve the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control and use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellAddress%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine the row and column indexes of the active cell.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl.EditingControlDataGridView%2A>til å hente overordnet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollere og bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellAddress%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å fastslå rad- og indeksene i den aktive cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellAddress%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl.EditingControlDataGridView%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row that contains the cell, or –1 if there is no parent row.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden som inneholder cellen eller -1 Hvis det er ingen overordnet rad.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the value of the editing control differs from the value of the hosting cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om verdien for redigering kontrollen er forskjellig fra verdien for verts cellen.

trans-unit.source: The EditingControlValueChanged property is set to `true` to indicate that the hosting cell's state has changed and its user interface (UI) needs to be updated to reflect this change in value.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen EditingControlValueChanged er satt til `true` å angi at verts cellen tilstanden er endret, og brukergrensesnittet (UI) må oppdateres for å gjenspeile denne endringen i verdien.

trans-unit.source: The owning cell or table will reset this property to `false` after an update.
trans-unit.target: Eier cellen eller tabellen vil tilbakestille denne egenskapen til `false` etter en oppdatering.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value of the control differs from the cell value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis verdien for kontrollen som er forskjellig fra celleverdien. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key that the editing control should process or a special key that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> should process.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den angitte nøkkelen er en vanlig inndata som redigering kontrollen skal behandle eller en spesiell nøkkel som den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> skal behandle.

trans-unit.source: An editing control implements this method to determine which input keys should be processed by the control, and which input keys should be processed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: En kontroll for redigering av implementerer denne metoden for å finne ut hvilke inndata taster skal behandles av kontrollen, og som inndata nøkler må behandles av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The EditingControlWantsInputKey method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden EditingControlWantsInputKey kalles av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> will pass in `true` for `dataGridViewWantsInputKey` when it can process the `keyData`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>vil sende i `true` for `dataGridViewWantsInputKey` når det kan behandle den `keyData`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the editing control can let the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> handle the `keyData`, EditingControlWantsInputKey should return `false` when `dataGridViewWantsInputKey` is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis redigering kontrollen kan la det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>håndtere den `keyData`, EditingControlWantsInputKey skal returnere `false` når `dataGridViewWantsInputKey` er `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Other implementations of EditingControlWantsInputKey may ignore a `dataGridViewWantsInputKey` value of `true` and handle the `keyData` in the editing control.
trans-unit.target: Andre implementeringer av EditingControlWantsInputKey kan Ignorer en `dataGridViewWantsInputKey` verdien `true` og håndtere den `keyData` i kontroll for redigering.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> that represents the key that was pressed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> som representerer nøkkelen som ble brukt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> wants to process the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> in `keyData`; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Når den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> ønsker å behandle den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> i `keyData`; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is a regular input key that should be handled by the editing control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den angitte nøkkelen er en vanlig inndata nøkkel som skal behandles av redigering kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cursor used when the mouse pointer is over the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> but not over the editing control.
trans-unit.target: Henter markøren brukes når musepekeren holdes over den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> , men ikke over kontroll for redigering.

trans-unit.source: The editing panel is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> that hosts the editing control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Redigering panelet er den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>at redigering vert styrer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen er i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>

trans-unit.source: The actual editing control may not cover the entire area of the editing panel.
trans-unit.target: Den faktiske kontrollen for redigering dekker ikke hele området for redigering panelet.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the EditingPanelCursor implementation should return the cursor to use when the mouse pointer is over the panel but not over the control.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet skal EditingPanelCursor implementeringen returnere markøren skal brukes når musepekeren er over panelet, men ikke over kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you will want to return the same cursor that the control uses.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis vil du returnere samme markør som bruker kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the cursor that appears when the pointer is over the control, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre markør som vises når pekeren er over kontrollen, må du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set this in the constructor of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl> implementation, or you can set it in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl.PrepareEditingControlForEdit%2A> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi dette i konstruktøren for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl>implementering, eller du kan angi den i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl.PrepareEditingControlForEdit%2A>implementeringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl.PrepareEditingControlForEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"></xref> that represents the mouse pointer used for the editing panel.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"> </xref> som representerer musepekeren brukes for redigering panelet.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter den formaterte verdien i cellen.

trans-unit.source: The formatted value represents the value as it is displayed in the control's user interface.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er formatert representerer verdien som de vises i brukergrensesnittet for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The formatted value may be different in absolute value and even data type from the actual value contained in the control.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er formatert kan være forskjellig i absoluttverdien og selv datatype fra den faktiske verdien i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: To set the formatted value of the control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl.EditingControlFormattedValue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi den formaterte verdien for kontrollen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl.EditingControlFormattedValue%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl.EditingControlFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"></xref> values that specifies the context in which the data is needed.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts"> </xref> verdier som angir konteksten som kreves for dataene.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the formatted version of the cell contents.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer formaterte versjonen av celleinnholdet.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Prepares the currently selected cell for editing.
trans-unit.target: Forbereder den valgte cellen for redigering.

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is to prepare the control and its contents for editing.
trans-unit.target: Formålet med denne metoden er ikke forberede kontrollen og innholdet for redigering.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to put the insertion point at the end of the contents, or change how the contents are aligned.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel sette pekeren på slutten av innholdet, eller endre hvor innholdet er justert.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to select all of the cell's content; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>velge alle celleinnholdet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cell contents need to be repositioned whenever the value changes.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om celleinnholdet skal flyttes når verdien endres.

trans-unit.source: Some situations require that cell contents reposition when the value changes.
trans-unit.target: Enkelte tilfeller krever at celleinnholdet replassere når verdien endres.

trans-unit.source: For example, cell contents may need to reposition when a cell wraps text and the contents become larger.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel må kanskje celleinnholdet replassere når en celle bryter tekst og innholdet bli større.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the contents need to be repositioned; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis innholdet må flyttes; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
